body_html:
And for everybody who wants easy access to the form: we have a time travelling switch, which makes visiting the form easier. Go to http://localhost:3000/orga/seasons. Switch to the Application phase.
After clicking Apply now, you have to add yourself to a team and then you can view and play with the form.

body:
And for everybody who wants easy access to the form: we have a time travelling switch, which makes visiting the form easier. Go to http://localhost:3000/orga/seasons. Switch to the Application phase. 
After clicking Apply now, you have to add yourself to a team and then you can view and play with the form.
